pages.text: Guardians from the Spirit Realm representing Death itself, serving to reap creatures to take their essence back to their homeworld.$(br2)They carry all sorts of items usable for reaping, including the Soul Reaper which is a powerful scythe originating from the Spirit Realm.
Unlike your usual hostiles, they are neutral to you and other fellow reapers. It is best to leave them to their business unless you want a really bad time.
